channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter in the field, 11th April
item.description:
There’s a pile of litter in the field here, looks like maybe some youths met up last night and couldn’t find the bins. Piles of plastic bottles etc.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Rothleigh, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
